head.supplied: ¶ [I have this day received from Dr Mueller a canister full of Olive seeds of good sorts by direction of the Commission for Forests and foreign Industries. To be raised in our Nursery ground with a v...

div.p: Unit 50, VPRS 575 Borough of Castlemaine sundry records, Public Record Office, Victoria.

MS is a file note from Doran to the Mayorand members of the Borough Council,Castlemaine,Vic,dated 6 September 1871.M was also at this time distributing cuttings of grape vines; see M to P. Doran, 24 August 1871 (in this edition as 71-08-24c).
[I have this day received from Dr Mueller a canister full of Olive seeds of good sorts by direction of the Commission for Forests and foreign Industries. To be raised in our Nursery ground with a view of distributing the plants in our district]
